website_summaries.verdict: This top-notch green tea lotion has been shown to make the skin feel silky and smooth.
pros: Infused with green tea extract that hydrates the skin
Lotion's aroma helps energize the body
Offers exceptional results for people who are dealing with oily or greasy skin
Makes the skin feel soft without being too sticky
cons: Lotion's aroma quickly disappears following initial application
Delivers minimal moisturizing results in comparison to similar products

customer_reviews.title: love this scent
customer_reviews.text: I am a nurse and like to smell good while i'm at work without the "perfumey" smell that may be unpleasant to my sick patients. This scent is perfect because it's a fresh, clean, "citrusy" scent, and I get compliments on it all the time. This is one of all time favorites. I took away one star because the lotion did not have a seal, therefore it could have been used or it could have been tampered with. I will not buy again unless I can be assured that it is a new sealed product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scent for twelve years!

product_meta.title: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Refreshing Body Lotion, 6.8 oz
product_meta.description:
Introduced in 1999, Green Tea features citrus lemon, rhubarb, peppermint, oakmoss, musk and amber. Its recommended use is for daytime occasions.When applying any fragrance please consider that there are several factors which can affect the natural smell of your skin and, in turn, the way a scent smells on you. For instance, your mood, stress level, age, body chemistry, diet, and current medications may all alter the scents you wear. Similarly, factor such as dry or oily skin can even affect the amount of time a fragrance will last after being applied

BRAND STORY
From a lush, green world of freshness comes Elizabeth Arden Green Tea, the fragrance that energizes the body, excites the senses and invigorates the spirit.
